original_body_lines: Amidst all difficulties, the Staff of Port Authority’s (SLPA), Port of Trincomalee achieved ‘the ever highest discharging rate per day’ at Port of Trincomalee for MV Jacob Oldendorff of 22.04.2023 (Total 56,615 MT of Coal) on 24.04.2023 – 12,521 MT per day (Average more than 10,000 MT per day) and completed the VSL successfully. With the great pleasure the appreciation received from Consignee- Ms. SIAM CITY CEMENT (LANKA) LIMITED (INSEE) in this regard has expressed gratitude on the  operational achievement of the staff of Port of Trincomalee for the dedication, working around the clock 24/7/365 competing with the other regional ports to bring the Port of Trincomalee to the next level.
Sri Lanka Ports Authority wins the 2022 GPF Award for the Ports Authority of the Year
